purpose: To serve as a personalized AI assistant that uses the user's machine as a window to perceive and interact with their external world.
principle: Built on Kotlin, Claudine leverages the user's local environment to tailor its functionality to individual needs and contexts.
reusability: Designed as a standalone AI assistant, it can be integrated into various personal computing environments.
limitations: As an alpha version, it may have limited functionality and stability. It is dependent on the local machine's capabilities.
name: claudine
description: Claudine, the only AI assistant you will ever need. An AI agent, which is using your machine as a window to external world, therefore perceiving your reality, values and needs, and reasoning how to fulfill them.
highlight: Claudine acts as an AI assistant that perceives and adapts to the user's environment, values, and needs.
